Stools are unobtainable items used while playing games in the Burthorpe Games Room, the Games Zone, or in pubs. The stools are technically wieldable items, used to display the sitting animation.

It has the appearance of a steel axe in the player's inventory, as only the equipped model is ever supposed to be seen ingame.
